location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'ROAD MAP Present Operations PROVINCE OF HASA, SAUDI ARABIA.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 633 x 537mm, on sheet 708 x 610mm

mods.abstract: The map shows a central northern portion of the Arabian Peninsula, indicating roads and camel routes, geographical regions, hydrology, vegetation, settlements and wells, with some indication of relief.The map bears the printing statement, 'Survey Section[, General Staff, India] No. 1228 Nov. 1940.'
